Fabrício Martins Mazzola

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/2243053098009957
  • Última atualização do currículo em 16/05/2019

I am Ph.D. student at the Informatics Institute of UFRGS - Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul. I have a bachelor degree in Computer Science by UFRGS (2019). My research interests are networked and distributed systems. I have been working with Internet measurements, network analytics, SDN (Software Defined Networking) and data-center networks. (Texto informado pelo autor)
